description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing authentication state, including user info, token, role, loading state, and error handling. It includes methods for initialization, login, registration, and logout, leveraging external API functions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches current user info and updates the store accordingly.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs login with provided credentials, updates user state upon success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided payload, updates store upon success.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and clears user state.
